sentences.cn: A: 很抱歉,我的脾气那么不好.

sentences.en: A true lady or gentleman remains at home with grouch same as if they has pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 真正的绅士或淑女,即使在发脾气的时候,也会像患上了肺炎般留在家里.

sentences.en: Back off , Kit. You know, you're really becoming a grouch.
sentences.cn: 别逼人,丫头, 知道吗? 你真的变成讨人厌了.

sentences.en: Did you get up with a grouch today? - No, she got up before me.
sentences.cn: 你今早起来的时候感觉心情不佳 吗 ? —— 不, 它比我起得早呢.

sentences.en: He reflected, " What's the matter with me today? Seems like I've got an awful grouch. "
sentences.cn: 他暗暗寻思: “ 我今天怎么啦? 仿佛情绪不对头. ”

sentences.en: He's always having a grouch about something.
sentences.cn: 他总是发脾气抱怨这个抱怨那个.

sentences.en: He's an old grouch but she puts up with him.
sentences.cn: 他是个喜欢抱怨的老头，但是她对他很包容。

sentences.en: I'm sorry I was such grouch.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉,我的脾气那么不好.大概是天气的缘故.

sentences.en: In fact, he was considered a terrible grouch, a very mean - spirited and temperamental person.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 他是个有名的脾气坏 、 心胸狭窄、喜怒无常的人.

sentences.en: Mr. Dawson grouch [ graut ? ] , and everyone in town knew it.
sentences.cn: 道森 先生是个坏脾气的老头子,镇上的每个人都知道这个.

sentences.en: Of course, they all call me a grouch.
sentences.cn: 他们大家当然说我爱发牢骚.

sentences.en: Wang started to be a grouch.
sentences.cn: 小王开始对所有的事怒目相斥.

sentences.en: You're nothing but an old grouch!
sentences.cn: 你就是个爱发牢骚的老家伙!

words.tran_cn: 不高兴的，不满的；不平的
心怀不满；不高兴的人；抱怨

trans.tran_cn: 爱抱怨的人，脾气坏的人，牢骚，生气
trans.tran_en: A grouch is someone who is always complaining in a bad-tempered way
